data.value: Empowerment
Slide to the left or right to select a sentence describing your most likely behaviour.
Take ownership and responsibility
I portray an unhelpful attitude and/or display a lack of ownership and commitment (example: saying ‘it’s not my job/this cannot be done, ...’) and/or procrastinate.
I demonstrate willingness/strive for successful results. In line of duty, I am glad to take charge and to drive activities to closure.
I take charge and remove all barriers to ‘make it happen’ displaying a ‘can-do’ attitude. I use the words ‘opportunity’, ‘solution’ rather than ‘problem’ in form of challenges.
I do not know.
Offer own expertise, knowledge, and capabilities to serve the team
I miss opportunities to offer expertise, knowledge, experience and capabilities to solve an issue or enhance our creations and services.
I offer my expertise to serve team members to allow them to operate.
I contribute to the success of the team by sharing and transferring knowledge and experience.
I do not know.
Ask for support and/or resources needed to accomplish their own job
I miss the opportunity to ask for appropriate resources or support needed to execute my own job, resulting in low quality or delay.
I ask for support and/or resources needed to meet expectations on time.
I anticipate potential resources, constraints and/or engage the right people to develop solutions to deliver any engagement taken on time, at the target quality.
I do not know
Propose solutions considering the impact on others, on revenue, on costs, or other metrics
I may miss the opportunity to propose solutions within the scope of one’s job that impact the business.
I propose solutions considering my impact on clients' perception, revenue, cost, …  I demonstrate openness to challenge current status quo if not in line with the results to be achieved.
I identify solutions considering the alignment with the Maison’s strategy. I build a solid rationale and share it with those impacted.
I do not know.
Acknowledge mistakes and failures. Learn and move forward
I may miss the opportunity to handle mistakes and failures as I cannot accept and/or cover them and/or blame others for my mistakes.
I acknowledges mistakes and failures. I learn from them.
I openly share my mistakes and key learnings. I set the conditions to move forward, increasing trust and willing to do differently.
I do not know.
